testsuite.name: SDK initialiation
testsuite.details: SDK initialiation without list of placement

testcase.name: Check auto-cached placement ID
testcase.summary: Check auto-cached placement ID
testcase.preconditions: 1.Install vungle app.

step.actions:
1.Enter Pub App ID [i.e5a41e8deeca5a79137000f83] [i.e5a41e8deeca5a79137000f83]

2.Enter end-points [i.e:https://apiqa.vungle.com/api/v5]

3.Initialise the SDK.

4.Check for Auto-cached placement ID.
step.expectedresults:
1.All active placement id should be displayed on testapp as well as on config response which is associated with Pub APP ID.

2.Auto-cached placement id should be auto-cached /preload without tapping on load button.

testcase.name: Non Auto-cached Placement
testcase.summary: Check non auto-cached placement ID
testcase.preconditions: 1. Install app.

step.actions:
1.Enter Pub App ID [i.e5a41e8deeca5a79137000f83]

2.Enter end-points [i.e:https://apiqa.vungle.com/api/v5]

3.Initialise the SDK.

4.Check for non Auto-cached placement ID.
step.expectedresults:
1.All active placement id should be displayed on testapp as well as on config response which is associated with Pub APP ID.

2.Placement id should not be autocached/preload.

testcase.name: One or zero auto-cached placement ID
testcase.summary: Check for one or zero auto-cached placement IDs form dashboard.
testcase.preconditions: Vungle app should be installed.

step.actions:
1.Create Pub ID from dashboard.

2.Check for one or zero Auto-cached placement ID.

3.Enter Pub App ID [i.e 5a41e8deeca5a79137000f83]

4.Enter end-points [i.e:https://apiqa.vungle.com/api/v5]

5.Initialise the SDK.
step.expectedresults:
1.If auto-cached checkbox is check, only one placement is should be selected as a auto-cached placement id.

2.If auto-cached checkbox is unchecked, no placement is should be auto-cached/preload.

testcase.name: Update Placement list
testcase.summary: Check updated placement list in SDK
testcase.preconditions:
1.Vungle app should be installed.
2.Update existing placement id name.

step.actions:
1)Enter Pub APP ID in app having updated placement id's and initialize the SDK.

2) Observe placement id name displayed in config response.
step.expectedresults: Updated placement ID's should get displayed in config response when SDK is initialized.

testcase.name: SDK initialise
testcase.summary: Check SDK initialise
testcase.preconditions: 1.Vungle app should be installed.

step.actions:
1) Enter valid Pub APP ID & End points

2)Tap on start button
step.expectedresults: 1) SDK should initialize successfully

testcase.name: Initialize the SDK with invalid pub app ID.
testcase.summary: Check invalid Pub App ID.
testcase.preconditions: 1.Vungle app should be installed.

step.actions:
1) Enter invalid Pub APP ID & End points

2)Tap on start button
step.expectedresults: User should not be able to initialise SDK with invalid Pub App ID.

testcase.name: Pub app ID having multiple placement ids.
testcase.summary: Check limitations of placement ids in Pub App ID.
testcase.preconditions:
1.Vungle app should be installed.

2.Pub app ID should have multiple placement ids when checked from dashboard.

step.actions:
1.Enter Pub App ID [i.e5a41e8deeca5a79137000f83]

2.Enter end-points

3.Initialise the SDK.

4.Check for placement ids in Pub App ID. For Example:-Pub App ID having 30/40 placement ids.
step.expectedresults:
1.All active placement id should be displayed on testapp as well as on config response which is associated with Pub APP ID.

2.There should not be any limitation to displayed placement id's.

3.Every listed placement id should have ads associted with it.

testcase.name: Check 'is_auto_cached' parameter in config response
testcase.summary: Check 'is_auto_cached' parameter in config response.
testcase.preconditions: SDK version should be 5.1.0 or 5.1.0+

step.actions:
1.Enter Pub App ID [i.e5a41e8deeca5a79137000f83]

2.Enter end-points [i.e:https://apiqa.vungle.com/api/v5]

3.Initialise the SDK.

4.Check config response.
step.expectedresults:
1.'is_auto_cached' parameter should be present in config response.

2.By default 'is_auto_cached' parameter's value  should be 'false' in config response.

3.If 'is_auto_cached' parameter's value is 'true' then ad should get auto-cached/preload.

4.If 'is_auto_cached' parameter's value is 'false' then none of the placement should get auto-cached/preload.

testcase.name: Auto-Cache with more than one Placement
testcase.summary: Auto-Cache with more than one Placement
testcase.preconditions: App id should contain multiple placement id's

step.actions:
1. Manipulate auto-cache parameter as "True" for all placement id's in config response.
2. Initialize app
3. Observe Auto cache functionality
step.expectedresults:
1. All placement id's should load automatically.
2. Manual intervention should not be required to load ad.
3. Ad should get loaded automatically and user should be able to play ad

testcase.name: Ad Unit Caching
testcase.summary: Check caching of multiple Ad's
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install app 
2. Initialize the app

step.actions:
1)Install the App on device and set charles Proxy.  
2)Enter the Placement id's.
3)Initialize the SDK.
4)Observe the charles. 
5)Play the Ads.
6)Repeat 3,4,5
step.expectedresults:
1) SDK should download multiple Ads for all placement id's which entered by user.
2)Ads should play normally.

testcase.name: Ad Unit Caching for corresponding placement ID
testcase.summary: Check caching of  Ad for corresponding placement ID
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install app 
2. Initialize the app

step.actions:
1)Install the App on device and set charles Proxy.  
2)Enter multiple valid  Placement id.
3)Manually initialize the App
4)Tap on download button in front of placement ID for caching Ad to it.
5)Observe the Charles.
step.expectedresults:
1. Ad should download for corresponding placement ID.
2. Ad should play normally on device.

testcase.name: Placement ID serve the Ad or not
testcase.summary: Check placement id serve the Ad or not.
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install app 
2. Initialize the app

step.actions:
1)Start the App. 
2)Enter placement ID in TestApp.  
3)Initialize the App. 
4)Play the Ad.
step.expectedresults: Placement ID should serve the Ad and Ad should play normally on TestApp with respect to the placement id.

testcase.name: Check response payload of config API
testcase.summary: To check response payload of config API
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install app 
2. Initialize the app

step.actions:
1)Install the App on  device and set charles Proxy.  
2)Enter the Placement id's.
3)Manually initialize the SDK.
4)Observe response payload of config API in the charles Proxy.
step.expectedresults:
1) Response Status should : HTTP 200 OK in charles.  
2) Response Json file should contain the following field:- 
"api_endpoints","placement_info","config","will_play_ad","playback"

testcase.name: Request payload of Ads API

testcase.preconditions:

step.actions:

step.expectedresults:

testcase.name: Response payload of Ads API
testcase.summary: To check response payload of Ads API
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install app 
2. Initialize the app

step.actions:
1)Install the App on device and set charles Proxy.  
2)Enter valid Placement id.
3)Manually initialize the SDK.
4)Observe response payload of RequestAd API in the charles Proxy
step.expectedresults:
1) Response Status should : HTTP 200 OK in charles.  
2) Response Json file should contain the following field for valid placement id:-"placement_reference_id", "ad_markup"
[id:,adType,campaign,callToActionUrl,countdown,showClose,cta_overlay,expiry ,app_id,showCloseIncentivized,delay,preBundle:,postBundle:,callToActionDest:,tpat:url:,videoWidth: ,videoHeight: ,md5:,size: ,chk:,retryCount: ,asyncThreshold: ,ad_token:,
video_object_id:,templateURL:,templateId:,templateFormat:,templateSettings:,info:,sleep]

testcase.name: Ad cached for corresponding placement ID's
testcase.summary: To check  Ad cached for corresponding placement ID's
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install app 
2. Initialize the

step.actions:
1)Install the App on Windows device and set charles Proxy.  
2)Enter valid  Placement id and activate it.
3)Manually initialize the App
4)Observe  the charles Proxy.
5)Open main screen of App.
6)Observe the placement ID's status.
step.expectedresults:
1)If Ad is cached for placement A , Play Ad button should enable on App.
2) If Ad is not cached for placement A , Play Ad button should disable on App.

step.actions:
)Install the App on Windows device and set charles Proxy.  
2)Enter  valid  Placement id & activate it.
3)Manually initialize the App
4)Open second tab of App.
5)Observe the placement ID's status.
6)If  Ad is not cached for any placement ID's , tap on force download button in front of it.
7)Observe  the charles Proxy.
8)After Ad cached ,tap on play Ad button in front of placement ID.
step.expectedresults:
1) Ad should cached for corresponding placement ID,  after tap on  play button Ad should play on device.
2) If incase Ad is not cached for corresponding placement ID, tap on loadAd button to cached A.

testcase.name: Ad cached for only active placement ID's

2. Initialize the app

testcase.name: Placement Incentivized / non incentivized
testcase.summary: Check if Placement Incentivized / non incentivized is honored
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install app 
2. Initialize the app

step.actions:
1)Install the App on  device and set charles Proxy.  
2)Enter a valid Placement id and active entered ID.
3)Initialize the App and play the ad.
step.expectedresults:
1)The SDK should honor the Incentivized / non Incentivized setting
 
Example: if for a Placement id the ad is set to be incentivized, SDK should always play an incentivized Ad, and opposite for non Incentivized Ad
2)Observe incentivized flag value(0/1) in request payload of reportAd

testcase.name: Request Replacement Ad
testcase.summary: Check if SDK sends a Replacement Ad request after An Ad is played
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install app 
2. Initialize the app

step.actions:
1)Install the App on  device and set charles Proxy.  
2)Enter a valid Placement id's and active entered ID.
3)Initialize the App and play the ad.
step.expectedresults: After an Ad is played, the SDK should send an request to the AD server to get another AD for the Auto Cache placement ID.

testcase.name: TPAT on placement
testcase.summary: Check Placement ID present or not in corresponding creative
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install app 
2. Initialize the app

step.actions:
1)Install the App on  device and set charles Proxy.  
2)Enter the Placement id's.
3)Manual initialize the App/May be it's automatically initialise.
4)After Ad cached play full the Ad and close the end card/video.
5)Observe TPAT in the charles.
step.expectedresults:
When the SDK sends TPATs, they should include
i.e Placement Reference Id
about which placement the TPAT is for.
TPAT URL should match with the URL in the Request Ad API response.

testcase.name: Auto catched placement
testcase.summary: Check catched Ad is Played or not when user kill the app and reopen it
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install app 
2. Initialize the app

step.actions:
1)Install the App on device and set charles Proxy.  
2)Enter the valid Placement id and activate it.
3)Manual initialize the App/May be it's automatically initialise.
4)observe charles if ad is completely catched 
5)kill the app
6)re-open the app and initialize it
7)Play ad
step.expectedresults: SDK should play previous catched ad first

testcase.name: User agent in API callls
testcase.summary: Presence of user agent in Vungle Endpoints for /new, /config, /ads, /will_play_ad, /report_ad, /ri
testcase.preconditions: 1.Install the app.

step.actions:
1. Initialise the app.

2. Enter pub app id.

3. Load ad.

4. Play ad.

5. Observer user agent in Config/new/ads/will_play_ad/Report Ad API
step.expectedresults:
1. Similar user agent should be present in all API call headers
2. User agent should be displayed in following format:

User-Agent : "VungleDroid/<sdk_version>"
Eg. User-Agent: VungleDroid/6.3.17

testcase.name: Parameters for request payload of ri API
testcase.summary: Check ri parameters for request payload
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.
2. Set ri enabled value true in request and map config file.  
3. Initialise the app.

step.actions:
1. Install the App and set charles Proxy.  
2. Enter the valid Placement id's.
3. Initialise the App.
4. Observe request payload parameter of ri API
step.expectedresults:
1. All parameters should displayed with it's value in request payload of ri.
2.Request payload should display following value.
"app": {...},
"device": {...},
"system": {...},
"request":{
"placement_reference_id":"REWARDE78811",
"adStartTime":1517012478,
"app_id":"$0$
{\"app_id\":\"5a57e2c45ccf1f44250129b8\",\"eventID\":\"5a6bbff587cf640be35187d1\"}
",
"user":"ggreg"
}

testcase.name: ri enabled value is true in request payload of config.
testcase.summary: Check ri enabled value in request payload of config.
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.

2. Set ri enabled value true in request and map config file.

3. Initialise the app.

step.actions:
1. Install the App and set charles proxy.
2. Enter the valid Placement id's.
3. Initialise the App.
4. Observe the request payload of config API.
step.expectedresults:
If ri value is true in request payload of config then you see ri call when the Incentivized Ad has reached 75-80% of completion.

(ri API - https://events.api.vungle.com/api/v5/ri )

4. Observe the request payload of config API
step.expectedresults: If ri value is false in request payload of config then you should not see ri call when the Ad has reached 75-80% of completion.

testcase.name: Sequence of API calls
testcase.summary:
Check sequence of APL Calls
New:- very first time only
Config
ads:- after config
will_play_ad:- when user tap on play button
reportAd:- After ad close.
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install app

testcase.name: view discrepancy
testcase.summary: Check and compare eventID in response of rquestAd and reportAd
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install app 
2. Initialize the app

step.actions:
1)Install the App on device and set charles Proxy.  
2)Enter placement ID.
4)Initialize the App and play the Ad.

6)after playing Ad observe new event ID for new request. and kill the APP.
7)Reopen the App and play the Ad.
8)Observe the eventID in reportAd.
step.expectedresults:
1) before killing App eventID should same in  response of requestAd and reportAd.
2)Before killing note down new requestAd's eventID it should same in reportAd when user reopen the app play the ad.

testcase.name: Manipulate the "sleep" parameter value in response of ads
testcase.summary: check Manipulate the "sleep" parameter value in response of ads
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install app 
2. Initialize the app

step.actions:
1) Map ads response with sleep response.
2) Initialize app
3) Observe Ads API call in Charles
step.expectedresults: The SDK should wait the amount of sleep seconds specified by the server

step.actions:
Enter:
AppID: 595d73ee3087f51025000040
Placements: DEFAULT63909, GOSLEEP27738, MRAID0058210
 
Steps:
1. Launch the test app
2. LoadAd for sleep placement id (this gets sleep response)
3. LoadAd for sleep placement id
step.expectedresults: User should not be able to LoadAd if  SDK receive sleep response from the previous LoadAd request

step.actions:
Enter:
AppID: 595d73ee3087f51025000040
Placements: DEFAULT63909, GOSLEEP27738, MRAID0058210
 
Steps:
1. Launch the test app
2. LoadAd for sleep placement id (this gets sleep response)
3. LoadAd for sleep placement id
step.expectedresults:
1) Sleep on ads response should affect only on the specific placement for that duration.
2) Except the Placement that got sleep, SDK should be able to prepare ads for other Placements.
3) For any sleep response SDK should return Ad Unavailable for that Placement.
4) Sleep for auto cached ads on expiration, should resume preparation of ad.
5) Sleep for non auto cached ad should not resume preparation of ad automatically.
6) On context switching to other apps, or even in case of forced stop or kill the app, on resuming or re initialisation of SDK should Honor any existing sleep for Placements.

testcase.name: Flexview Ad Close timer option

6. Unlock the device after flexview close timer value (Eg. 25 sec).

testcase.name: To Check changing GeoLocation test app hangs or not
testcase.summary: To Check test app hangs or not using changing GeoLocation
testcase.preconditions: Install app on devices or system

step.actions:
1. Launch the test app
2. Start the test
3. LoadAd
4. PlayAd
5. Goto location setting and
6. Try both Location "on" and "off", and then run the QA Test apps
7. Run an Ad, and then check to see if the Test app hangs, or if Task Manager shows heavy disk or CPU usage after a minute or two.

Also check following messages in Event Viewer
1. To get to "Location Settings", type "Location" in the search bar ("Type here to search"), and then click on "location privacy settings".

2.To run Task Manager, hold down Ctrl+Alt+Delete and choose "Task Manager", and then click on "Perfomance" or "Details" to watch CPU or disk usage.

3.Also, check the Event Viewer (in an explorer window, right-click on “This PC”, click on “Manage”, “Event Viewer”, “Application”), and check for Errors that look like the following (I’ve bolded the important parts):
*Summary*
*WindowsNonFatalSuspectedDeadlock*
Date
‎12/‎15/‎2017 9:30 PM
Status
Report sent
Problem signature
Problem Event Name: *WindowsNonFatalSuspectedDeadlock*
Version: 2
AppName: Unknown
FaultingModule: Geolocation.dll
InternalComponentId: *GetGeopositionOperationImpl*
DeadlockTimeoutMs: 420000
OriginatingCodeHint: Windows::Devices::Geolocation:: *GetGeopositionOperationImpl::InitializeAndStart*
OS Version: 10.0.16299.2.0.0.768.101
Locale ID: 1033
Extra information about the problem
Bucket ID: b903f13bfce510faf0ee362f905bee82 (127983441306)
step.expectedresults: After changing Geolocation test app should not hang and should not displayed error message in *Event viewer*

testcase.name: Close button behavior for MRAID video
testcase.summary: Based on "INCENTIVIZED_CLOSE_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS" and "CLOSE_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS" parameter value, the SDK should behave accordingly
testcase.preconditions:
1. Set Charles proxy.
  2. Initialise the App 
  3. play ad
  4. Observe the Charles.

step.actions: 1)"INCENTIVIZED_CLOSE_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS": "9999", "CLOSE_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS": "5", 2)"INCENTIVIZED_CLOSE_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS": "5", "CLOSE_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS": "9999", 3)"INCENTIVIZED_CLOSE_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS": "9999", "CLOSE_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS": "9999", set thees value in Ads response API
step.expectedresults: 1) This case, when it's not incentivized, it should use the "CLOSE_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS" value, which is 5. if it's incentivized, use 9999, which is skippable close button. 2) This case, when it's not incentivized, it should use the "CLOSE_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS" value, which is skippable close button; otherwise, it should delay for 5 seconds. 3) This case, when it's not incentivized, it should use the "CLOSE_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS" value, which is 9999 which is skippable close button.. if it's incentivized, use 9999, which is skippable close button.
